articles.author: Mick Krever, Phil Black, Kostyantin Gak, and Richard Harlow, CNN
articles.title: Deep in the eastern Ukrainian forest, this group of volunteers waits as Russia's military creeps closer
articles.description: Maxym is waiting. For just over a month, he and his comrades have been sleeping in earthen dugouts, eating from cans warmed over campfires, and following news of the Russian military advancing just kilometers away.

articles.title: 1 child is found dead in a Minnesota lake, 2 others remain missing in a potential triple homicide, police say
articles.description: Rescue and recovery efforts were underway late Friday after authorities in Minnesota found the body of one child in a lake while two other children are missing, police said.

articles.title: Fareed's take: A radical court - CNN Video
articles.description: Following a week of divisive rulings by the US Supreme Court on abortion and guns, Fareed gives his take on the historically impartial institution that he says is becoming increasingly political.
